partners.name: Partners
partners.title: They trust Us
partners.subtitle: Our trusted partners who support us in our mission to drive Africa’s digital transformation.

hero.title: African Financial Resources and Optimization
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in building sustainable economic sovereignty in Africa.
hero.description: We develop cutting-edge technological solutions to promote financial inclusion and support the adoption of emerging technologies, serving Africa’s integrated and sustainable development.

company.title: Our Mission
company.description: AFRO Group is a tech company dedicated to financial and educational innovation in Africa. We create solutions that transform how Africans access financial services and education.
company.visionText: To become Africa’s leader in technological innovation by building an inclusive and accessible financial and educational ecosystem.

fined.title: FinEd
fined.subtitle: Financial Literacy
fined.description: FinEd is more than just an app: it’s an intelligent platform that teaches you to master your money while giving you the digital tools to manage your finances every day.

featuresDescription.education: Interactive modules covering the basics of money management, investing, saving, and more.
featuresDescription.tools: Practical tools to track expenses, create budgets, and plan financial goals.
featuresDescription.community: Join a community of learners to share advice, ask questions, and grow together.
featuresDescription.ai: An AI-powered virtual assistant to answer your financial questions and guide your learning.

pricing.title: Our Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you
pricing.description: Tailored solutions for every profile to master your finances and build your financial future.
pricing.enterpriseSubtitle: Tailored solutions for your specific needs

starter.name: Starter Pack
starter.subtitle: Free
starter.tagline: Perfect for starting your financial journey.
features: Access to a selection of educational videos
Basic expense tracking
Limited access to community forum and virtual assistant
Access to financial news

xamxam.name: XamXam Pack
xamxam.subtitle: 1,500 FCFA/month or 12,000 FCFA/year
xamxam.objective: Learn finance step by step and become autonomous.
xamxam.tagline: The perfect companion for managing your money daily.
features: Unlimited access to all educational videos
Bassirou AI Chatbot: your virtual advisor
Detailed expense tracking + monthly reports
Stock investment simulator
Access to personalized financial news
Monthly content updates (annual subscription)

entrepreneur.name: Entrepreneur Pack
entrepreneur.subtitle: 3,000 FCFA/month or 25,000 FCFA/year
entrepreneur.tagline: Designed for SMEs, freelancers and opportunity creators.
features: Financial management training adapted to your realities and African context
Credit simulator
Other budget planning tools
High-level bootcamps and webinars
Exclusive groups for entrepreneurs and networking

student.name: Student Pack
student.subtitle: Custom quote
student.target: Schools, universities and higher education institutions
student.objective: Train the new generation and tomorrow's leaders.
student.tagline: A turnkey solution for universities & business schools.
features: Access to FinEd's playful tools and content
Modules adapted to academic curricula and student life
Masterclasses and hybrid training sessions
Certification opportunities
Progress tracking by institution

inclusion.name: Financial Inclusion Pack
inclusion.subtitle: Custom quote
inclusion.objective: Invest in the future, empower communities.
inclusion.tagline: A partnership to change lives and strengthen your image.
features: Free access for youth, women and disadvantaged populations
Educational modules dedicated to financial education and sustainable finance
Impact reports and CSR action enhancement

legacy.name: Legacy Pack
legacy.subtitle: Custom quote
legacy.objective: Offer more than financial or banking services: educate and retain your clients.
legacy.tagline: An innovative solution to strengthen client trust and create differentiating value.
features: Access to personalized FinEd modules (savings management, responsible credit, sustainable finance)
Bank branding integrated into the app and content
Usage and impact reports by customer segment
Awareness against over-indebtedness and fraud
Promotion of your banking services and products

beta.title: BETA Consulting
beta.subtitle: Digital Transformation Consulting
beta.description: BETA Consulting advises and guides companies and institutions in their digital transformation through blockchain, providing advanced expertise in financial, logistics, and administrative sectors.

servicesDescription.implementation: Development of blockchain IT solutions tailored to your needs.
servicesDescription.training: Professional seminars and training for your teams.

beta.footer: Discover how BETA Consulting can transform your business with blockchain expertise.

blog.title: News & Insights
blog.subtitle: Stay informed on the latest trends

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Are you a company or institution looking to collaborate, contribute, or benefit from our innovative solutions? Get in touch today and let’s build impactful projects for Africa together.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.error: An error occurred while sending. Please try again.

footer.description: AFRO Group - Shaping Africa's future through finance, technology, and education.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.subtitle: Thank you for your purchase
success.description: Your subscription has been activated successfully. You can now enjoy all the benefits of your chosen package.
success.continueJourney: Continue your financial education journey with FinEd

fail.title: Payment Failed
fail.subtitle: Something went wrong with your payment
fail.description: Don't worry, no charges have been made to your account. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
